description.english: Kiss Sophie for the first time.
description.french: Embrassez Sophie pour la première fois.
description.spanish: Besas a Sophie por primera vez.
description.italian: Bacia Sophie per la prima volta.

description.german: Sieh zu, wie Eva sich auszieht.

description.english: Spend an intense moment with Fiona.
description.french: Passez un moment intense avec Fiona.
description.spanish: Pasa un momento intenso con Fiona.
description.german: Verbringe einen intensiven Moment mit Fiona.
description.schinese: 与菲奥娜度过强烈的一刻。
description.brazilian: Passe um momento intenso com Fiona.
description.italian: Vivi un momento intenso con Fiona.

description.english: Share a steamy shower with Vicky.
description.french: Partagez une douche brûlante avec Vicky.
description.spanish: Comparte una ducha ardiente con Vicky.
description.german: Teile eine dampfende Dusche mit Vicky.
description.schinese: 与维琪共享一场火热的淋浴。
description.brazilian: Compartilhe um banho escaldante com Vicky.
description.italian: Condividi una doccia bollente con Vicky.

description.english: Explore the basement and uncover its secret.
description.french: Explorez le sous-sol et découvrez son secret.
description.spanish: Explora el sótano y descubre su secreto.
description.russian: Исследуйте подвал и раскройте его секрет.
description.german: Erkunde den Keller und lüfte sein Geheimnis.
description.schinese: 探索地下室并揭开其秘密。
description.brazilian: Explore o porão e descubra seu segredo.
description.italian: Esplora il seminterrato e scopri il suo segreto.

description.english: What if she is really pregnant...?
description.french: Et si elle était vraiment enceinte... ?
description.russian: А что, если она правда беременна...?
description.german: Was, wenn sie wirklich schwanger ist...?
description.brazilian: E se ela estiver mesmo grávida...?
Eva confessa seus sentimentos por você.
description.italian: Eva ti confessa i suoi sentimenti.

description.spanish: Besas a Charlotte, la extraña psiquiatra.
description.schinese: 亲吻那位古怪的精神科医生夏洛特。

description.italian: La bellezza va oltre i generi.

description.french: Quand le fantasme devient trop réel.
description.spanish: Cuando la fantasía se vuelve demasiado real.
description.brazilian: Quando a fantasia fica real demais.
description.italian: Quando la fantasia diventa troppo reale.

description.english: A night you will not forget.
description.french: Une nuit que vous ne pourrez oublier.
description.spanish: Una noche que no podrás olvidar.
description.german: Eine Nacht, die du nicht vergisst.
description.brazilian: Uma noite que você não vai esquecer.

description.english: Share a swim... full of temptation.
description.french: Partagez une baignade... pleine de tentations.
description.spanish: Comparte un baño... lleno de tentaciones.
description.schinese: 共赴一场……充满诱惑的戏水。
description.brazilian: Compartilhe um mergulho... cheio de tentações.
description.italian: Condividi un bagno... pieno di tentazioni.

description.french: À trois, tout devient plus intense.
description.brazilian: A três, tudo fica mais intenso.
description.italian: In tre, tutto diventa più intenso.

description.spanish: El hambre puede volver loco a cualquiera.
En el club, sigue a Aurore.
description.schinese: 在俱乐部里跟着奥罗尔。

description.english: Some truly deserve what they get.
description.french: Certains méritent vraiment ce qu’ils récoltent.
description.spanish: Algunos reciben lo que se merecen.
description.brazilian: Alguns realmente recebem o que merecem.
description.italian: Alcuni meritano davvero ciò che raccolgono.

description.english: Open the box and discover its secret.
description.french: Ouvrez la boîte et découvrez son secret.
description.spanish: Abre la caja y descubre su secreto.
description.russian: Откройте ящик и узнайте его секрет.
description.german: Öffne die Box und enthülle ihr Geheimnis.
description.schinese: 打开盒子并揭示其秘密。
description.brazilian: Abra a caixa e descubra seu segredo.
description.italian: Apri la scatola e scopri il suo segreto.

description.spanish: La verdad por fin sale a la luz.
description.german: Die Wahrheit kommt endlich ans Licht.

description.english: I did not think she was like that.
description.french: Je ne pensais pas qu'elle était comme ça.
description.german: Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass sie so ist.
description.brazilian: Não achava que ela fosse assim.

description.english: It will be hard to recover from this...
description.french: Ça va être dur de s'en remettre...
description.german: Davon erholt man sich nur schwer...
description.brazilian: Vai ser difícil se recuperar disso...

description.english: A rave in the woods! Cool!
description.french: Une teuf dans les bois ! Cool !
description.brazilian: Uma rave na floresta! Que legal!
O que ele está fazendo aqui?

description.english: Liv finally opens up to you.
description.spanish: Liv por fin se abre contigo.
description.schinese: 丽芙终于向你敞开心扉。
description.brazilian: Liv finalmente se abre com você.
description.italian: Liv si apre finalmente con te.

description.french: Le moment tant attendu avec Liv.
description.spanish: El momento tan esperado con Liv.
description.german: Der lang ersehnte Moment mit Liv.
description.schinese: 与丽芙的期待已久的时刻。
description.brazilian: O momento tão esperado com Liv.
description.italian: Il momento tanto atteso con Liv.

description.french: Ce n'est pas bien de fouiner.

description.german: Was ist das für ein Ding!?

description.english: You found her, but at what cost.
description.french: Vous l'avez retrouvée, mais à quel prix.
description.spanish: La has encontrado, pero ¿a qué precio?
description.russian: Вы её нашли, но какой ценой.
description.german: Du hast sie gefunden, aber zu welchem Preis.
description.schinese: 你找到了她，但代价是什么。
description.brazilian: Você a encontrou, mas a que preço.
description.italian: L'hai ritrovata, ma a quale prezzo.

displayName.english: Tell Liv You Love Her at Last
displayName.french: Dites enfin à Liv que vous l'aimez.
displayName.spanish: Dile por fin a Liv que la quieres.
displayName.russian: Скажите наконец Лив, что любите её.
displayName.german: Sag Liv endlich, dass du sie liebst.
displayName.brazilian: Diga enfim a Liv que a ama.

description.french: Dis à Liv que tu l'aimes
description.spanish: Dile a Liv que la quieres.
description.russian: Скажи Лив, что ты её любишь.
description.german: Sag Liv, dass du sie liebst.
description.brazilian: Diga à Liv que você a ama.
description.italian: Dì a Liv che la ami.

description.french: Rejoignez Sophie à bord du vaisseau spatial.
description.spanish: Reúnete con Sophie a bordo de la nave espacial.
description.russian: Присоединитесь к Софи на борту космического корабля.
description.german: Triff Sophie erneut an Bord des Raumschiffs.
description.brazilian: Junte-se a Sophie a bordo da nave espacial.

description.french: Embrasser Sophie dans le vaisseau spatial
description.spanish: Besas a Sophie en la nave espacial.

description.english: With Linda, Fiona, and Vicky... what an adventure.
description.french: Avec Linda, Fiona et Vicky... quelle aventure.
description.spanish: Con Linda, Fiona y Vicky... menuda aventura.
description.russian: С Линдой, Фионой и Вики... вот это приключение.
description.german: Mit Linda, Fiona und Vicky... was für ein Abenteuer.
description.schinese: 与琳达、菲奥娜和维琪……真是一场冒险。
description.brazilian: Com Linda, Fiona e Vicky... que aventura.
description.italian: Con Linda, Fiona e Vicky... che avventura.

description.french: Entrez dans la chambre de Julie.
description.spanish: Entra en la habitación de Julie.

description.english: Watch Linda in an intimate moment.
description.french: Observez Linda dans un moment intime.
description.spanish: Observa a Linda en un momento íntimo.
description.russian: Наблюдайте за Линдой в интимный момент.
description.german: Beobachte Linda in einem intimen Moment.
description.brazilian: Observe Linda em um momento íntimo.
description.italian: Osa osservare Linda in un momento intimo.

description.spanish: Consulta los registros de la nave.
Besas a Vick-127 en la cama.

description.french: Rencontrez Olivia dans la maison de Ruby.
description.spanish: Conoce a Olivia en la casa de Ruby.
description.schinese: 在露比的房子里遇见奥利维娅。
description.brazilian: Conheça Olivia na casa da Ruby.
description.italian: Incontra Olivia nella casa di Ruby.

description.english: Share a moment in her house.
description.french: Partagez un instant dans sa maison.
description.spanish: Comparte un momento en su casa.
description.german: Teile einen Moment in ihrem Haus.
description.brazilian: Compartilhe um momento na casa dela.
description.italian: Condividi un momento nella sua casa.

description.german: Finde die Buchstaben ohne zu schummeln.
description.spanish: Encuentra las letras sin hacer trampas.
Encuentra el objeto antiguo y misterioso.
description.schinese: 找到古老而神秘的物件。
description.brazilian: Encontre o objeto antigo e misterioso.

description.english: Beat Linda at the arcade game.
description.french: Gagnez contre Linda au jeu d'arcade.
description.spanish: Vence a Linda en el juego arcade.
description.schinese: 在街机游戏中击败琳达。
description.brazilian: Vença Linda no jogo de arcade.
description.italian: Vinci contro Linda al gioco arcade.

description.french: Découvrez un secret à propos de Liv.
description.schinese: 发现关于丽芙的一个秘密。

description.english: Finish the game in Classic mode.
description.german: Beende das Spiel im klassischen Modus.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode classique.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en modo clásico.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo no modo clássico.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità classica.

description.english: Finish the game in Hardcore mode.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode hardcore.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en modo hardcore.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo no modo hardcore.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità hardcore.

description.english: Unlock all gallery images and complete your collection.
description.german: Schalte alle Galeriebilder frei und vervollständige deine Sammlung.
description.french: Débloquez toutes les images de la galerie et complétez votre collection.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las imágenes de la galería y completa tu colección.
description.schinese: 解锁画廊中的所有图片，完成你的收藏。
description.russian: Разблокируйте все изображения в галерее и завершите свою коллекцию.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as imagens da galeria e complete sua coleção.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le immagini della galleria e completa la tua collezione.

description.english: Once the story is finished, you unlock the mini game Sophie: AFK GAME. Play it and reach campaign level 10.
description.german: Sobald die Geschichte abgeschlossen ist, schaltet ihr das Minispiel Sophie: AFK GAME frei. Spielt es und erreicht Kampagnenstufe 10.
description.french: Une fois l'histoire finie, vous déverrouillez le petit jeu Sophie: AFK GAME. Jouez y et montez au niveau 10 de campagne.
description.italian: Una volta terminata la storia, sbloccherete il mini gioco Sophie: AFK GAME. Giocatelo e raggiungete il livello 10 della campagna.
description.spanish: Una vez terminada la historia, desbloquearán el minijuego Sophie: AFK GAME. Juéguenlo y alcancen el nivel 10 de campaña.
description.schinese: 故事完成后，你们会解锁迷你游戏 Sophie: AFK GAME。去玩吧，并达到战役等级10。
description.russian: После завершения истории вы разблокируете мини игру Sophie: AFK GAME. Играйте и достигните 10 уровня кампании.
description.brazilian: Depois de terminar a história, vocês desbloqueiam o minijogo Sophie: AFK GAME. Joguem e alcancem o nível 10 da campanha.
